1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

* 1st Tuesday of every month beginning at 6:00 p.m.
* City Hall
  3219 California Parkway
  Council Chambers
  Forest Hill, TX 76119

1. ![Sonja Coleman 2025](https://www.foresthilltx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4683 "Sonja Coleman 2025")

   #### Sonja Coleman

   Council Place 6 / Deputy Mayor Pro Tem

   [Email Sonja Coleman](mailto:scoleman@foresthilltx.org)

   Phone:
   469-799-6767

The Mayor and six City Council members are elected officials of the citizens of Forest Hill, Texas. They formulate public policy to meet the needs of the community. The City Council appoints the City Manager, the City Attorney, the Municipal Court Judge, and representatives of the various citizens' Boards and Commissions. The Council's public policy activities include adopting the City's annual budget, establishing general objectives, reviewing and adopting all ordinances and resolutions, and approving purchases and contracts as prescribed by City Charter and State Law.

Call City Hall at 817-568-3040 for more information.
